scripts.rust:build-nodejs: rimraf ./rust/wasm/pkg && cd rust/wasm; wasm-pack build --target=nodejs; cd ../..; npm run js:ts-json-gen; cd rust/wasm; wasm-pack pack
scripts.rust:build-browser: rimraf ./rust/wasm/pkg && cd rust/wasm; wasm-pack build --target=browser; cd ../..; npm run js:ts-json-gen; cd rust/wasm; wasm-pack pack
scripts.js:ts-json-gen: cd rust/json-gen && cargo +stable run && cd ../.. && node ./scripts/run-json2ts.js && node ./scripts/json-ts-types.js
